title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit! This award-winning kit is designed to captivate young minds and unleash their creativity while teaching them about the fascinating world of structural engineering.

With 20 models to build, your child will have endless hours of fun constructing various bridges and skyscrapers. The kit includes a whopping 285 pieces, providing ample opportunities for exploration and innovation. From columns and beams to trusses and plates, your child will learn about different structural elements and how they contribute to the strength and stability of a building.

But it doesn't stop there - this kit is a comprehensive learning tool. It covers essential concepts such as force, load, compression, and tension, allowing your child to gain a deeper understanding of how structures withstand external pressures. They will also explore different force types, including tension, compression, shear, and bending, to grasp the complexities of structural physics.

The Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit goes beyond just building models. It introduces your child to various bridge types, such as truss, arch, cantilever, rope, and suspension bridges, broadening their knowledge of engineering principles. Through a series of 20 model-building experiments, they will learn how to optimize structures for safety and cost, acquiring skills that can be applied to real-life scenarios.

This kit has been recognized for its excellence, receiving the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award. With its sleek blue color, it is sure to catch the eye of any aspiring engineer.

Included with the kit is an illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide, making it easy for your child to follow along and bring their creations to life. With 36 pages of detailed instructions, they will have all the guidance they need to embark on their engineering journey.

Invest in the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit today and watch your child's imagination soar as they unleash their inner engineer. Give them the tools to build a solid foundation for their future success.
